long_description: Designed to comfortably fit your kid's small body and busy schedule, the Marmot Half-Hitch pack is perfect for school, sports or a hike in the woods. Adjustable, ergonomic shoulder straps and sternum strap maximize fit and comfort. Panel-loading main compartment opens wide for easy packing and access. Secondary zippered pocket contains an organizer for accessories. The Marmot Half-Hitch pack features stretchy mesh water-bottle pockets and reflective accents.
short_description: Designed to comfortably fit your kid's small body and busy schedule, the Marmot Half-Hitch pack is perfect for school, sports or a hike in the woods.
